column1: Lead-based paint - Houses built before 1978 must disclose concentrations of lead paint used.
Authorized authorities - Landlords must provide names and addresses of any and all property owners or managers. If any of these people change, tenants must be notified in writing within 30 days.
Flooding risk - Landlords must disclose if a house has flooded 3 or more times in the past 5 years.
